commands.name: az communication create
commands.summary: Create a new CommunicationService or update an existing CommunicationService.
commands.syntax:
az communication create --data-location
                        --name
                        --resource-group
                        [--linked-domains]
                        [--location]
                        [--mi-system-assigned {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                        [--mi-user-assigned]
                        [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                        [--tags]

commands.name: az communication delete
commands.syntax:
az communication delete [--ids]
                        [--name]
                        [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                        [--resource-group]
                        [--subscription]
                        [--yes]

commands.name: az communication link-notification-hub
commands.summary: Links an Azure Notification Hub to this communication service.

commands.name: az communication list
commands.summary: List requests to list all resources in a resource group.

commands.name: az communication list-key
commands.summary: Get the access keys of the CommunicationService resource.

commands.name: az communication regenerate-key
commands.summary: Regenerate CommunicationService access key. PrimaryKey and SecondaryKey cannot be regenerated at the same time.

commands.name: az communication show
commands.summary: Get the CommunicationService and its properties.

commands.name: az communication update
commands.summary: Update a new CommunicationService or update an existing CommunicationService.
commands.syntax:
az communication update [--add]
                        [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                        [--ids]
                        [--linked-domains]
                        [--name]
                        [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                        [--remove]
                        [--resource-group]
                        [--set]
                        [--subscription]
                        [--tags]
                        [--type {None, SystemAssigned, SystemAssigned,UserAssigned, UserAssigned}]
                        [--user-assigned-identities]

commands.name: az communication wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
